titleStmt.title: The first part of the disquisition of truth, concerning political affaires Handled in two seuerall sections. The first whereof (by way of certaine questions probleme-wise propounded and answered) consisteth of foureteene chapters. Written by Henry Wright.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Henry, fl. 1616.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Variant: title page lacks comma after "truth".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
